website_summaries.verdict: Well-padded, warm and soft, with enough ankle support for casual skating, but their wide-running sizes can make skating uncomfortable.
pros: Very comfortable fit for those with wide feet without being as bulky as hockey skates
Nicely padded throughout, and very warm
Good ankle support for beginning and casual skaters
cons: Sizes run big, and users will likely need thick socks to fit properly
Not enough ankle support for some skaters
Wide foot last can make controlling skates tough

customer_reviews.title: ... then regular figure skates and the boot looks more like a hokey style boot
customer_reviews.text: These are larger then regular figure skates and the boot looks more like a hokey style boot. My teen loved them and has no problem using them to skate (beginer) -- But if you are looking for a traditional skate for figure skating lessons, this is not the boot for you. It is very padded and very warm-- It is true to size-- and my daughter said "it looks very cool", but the coach called them 'different' so perhaps they may not be the first choice from that perspective.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Like new - But sizing is way off
customer_reviews.text: These ice skates are great. They look brand new. Be aware, the sizing is off. The "Ladies 8" that they are sending out is actually EUR 41.5 (it says so blatantly on the box). That is about a ladies US 10. I was able to give them to my daughter and I am ordering a smaller pair for myself.
customer_reviews.author: KGH

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Fit & Great Quality! I’m a size 7.5 shoe and ordered the size 7 skate, fits perfectly with plenty of space in the toe box. Going up a size would have been to large so If your a half size I’d recommend sizing down. My size didn’t offer prime shipping, and it originally gave me a delivery time of 1-2 weeks, but i was pleasantly surprised when they arrived just 2 days after i placed my order. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Waaaaay to small. They don't pay return shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a sizeup and still waaaay too small. They don't pay for return shipping which is going to be a lot on ice skates. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Snook

customer_reviews.title: Beware of sizes
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. Sizes way off! Skate was at least 2-3 sizes smaller than they claimed in description.
customer_reviews.author: Justice 4 All

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunion and the description claimed they were wide and they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Laura Bethany Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Beginners skates with good ankle support
customer_reviews.text: Nice beginners skates considering they are not leather. Our daughter loved the extra ankle cushioning and the good support. Also, the tightening strap is a nice addition. But, she did not like that the blades were completely dull and needed to be sharpened before first use... They are TRUE to size, so if you wear a size 7 shoe, buy a size 7 !!! They do run a tad bit wide, but fit good with a warm pair of her slightly thicker socks.
customer_reviews.author: SewingGrammy

customer_reviews.title: Nice skates!
customer_reviews.text: Great skates for an adult beginner-intermediate recreational skater. They are padded like a hockey skate, and you can barely feel the blade under your feet, unlike the all leather figure skates. I was sent the wrong size but they fit so I will keep them. They took awhile to arrive was my only other issue. I would buy these again because I love the style! The company selling these could improve though!
customer_reviews.author: JDorval

customer_reviews.title: Everything I hoped for!!
customer_reviews.text: This skate is just as beautiful in person as in the picture. The lining is SO soft and comfortable. My 11 yr old daughter wears a women's 7.5 (that is with the thumb room to grow method), and I bought her an 8 so we could buy her heavy socks. I would buy this again in a heart beat!
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and they seem very well made. I passed over a few pairs here on Amazon in the +-$30 range that had many reviews of soles coming off. No such issues with these ones. I'm confident they'll work for 4-5 uses a season for many years to come. Needed 7.5 but only sold in whole sizes, 8 worked great. Figured a little loose would be better than tight and fixable with thick socks, but they did fit me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: GreatNorthWoods

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent sizing. Very frustrated
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7.5 shoe size. Ordered this in a women’s size 8 last year and loved it. Ordered another pair of the same size this year and they are almost an inch smaller than the first pair I ordered (see included photo) they both say women’s size 8 but are nowhere near the same size. The blade on the ones I ordered last year say 10 1/3, the new ones say 9 2/3 but they are both supposedly women’s size 8. I’m so confused on the size right now. I need to send back and get a bigger size but the 8’s I had before were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alita

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, soft
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, soft, well-crafted, stylish figure skate. Very sturdy, yet soft and fluffy to the feet with tremendous foot and ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Lor

customer_reviews.title: Pick problem....
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice skate, but I almost killed myself on them. The pick is in a different position from my old skates. Not sure why, so beware if you buy them. There will be a period of adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne K. George

customer_reviews.title: these skates are very comfortable. Very warm
customer_reviews.text: Just a casual skater, these skates are very comfortable. Very warm. I have been out skating in them for several hours at a time in 20 degree weather and my feet never got cold. I always have cold feet so that is saying alot. I really love these skates.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Broek

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!! Super comfy as far as ice skates ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! Super comfy as far as ice skates go! I am starting to ice skate after about 20 years of not skating. These were perfect to start with. They are also very pretty, and very warm.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: They were super uncomfortable at the beginning
customer_reviews.text: They were super uncomfortable at the beginning, but after 1 hour they sort of broke in and are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Galina

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: Very bad I ordered new ice skating shoes Got used one Above all there was a hair inside the Sketing 🙄😡
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Fits seems like same as street shoe size or just half size smaller. Good quality and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: JohnB21

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size 10 my shoe size figuring they would fit with extra room for my insoles. My feet didnt even fit. Way too small. I might try a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Size chart way off
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 8.5 got a 9 just to be safe and they were still too small. They’re pretty but they came with a little black mark on them, which was probably from the last return. They ship fast but don’t pay for return shipping which makes sense since their size chart is off.
customer_reviews.author: jeana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and very nicely built
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her skates . Perfect fit and very nicely built . She enjoys her lessons so much now .
customer_reviews.author: Erum Noman

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my shoe size and I could barely get it on, my toes were all crunched up, then I ordered the next size up and they felt exactly the same as the size before. Had to return both pairs.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: ... for my wife she said these are the most comfortable skates she has ever worn
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife she said these are the most comfortable skates she has ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: DShifter

customer_reviews.title: Great value, very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of ice skates. My 11-year-old daughter said they were super comfy from day one. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. She loved them and the fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ALMB

customer_reviews.title: A Winner for a beginning skater!
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be well-made. Were loved as a gift and used immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Norma S

customer_reviews.title: Soft inside, doesn't hurt the side bones of the feet (as others do), great ankle support. Amazing EVEN for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Soft inside, doesn't hurt the side bones of the feet (as others do), great ankle support. Amazing EVEN for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Tory

customer_reviews.title: Good starter skate!
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable skate! I use outdoors and indoors. Very durable and and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Zarett

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Very warm and comfy...can skate for hours without ankle aches. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Consumer

customer_reviews.title: But it is really comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: It feel just a little , just a little loose but I wear thick winter socks so that solves the issue. But it is really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ai chan1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These skates fit great and are very comfortable. Also great quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect. Make sure if you are a size 8 or 8.5 buy a size 7!!!! Vary comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Sam gindin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love these!!! Love these!! True to size and very very comfortable and warm ! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: tennisgirl3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and Great ankle support!
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner skates! Easy on and off yet easy to lace up tight enough for support. The strap just adds to the ankle support. So happy I purchased these for my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: SJP11707

customer_reviews.title: Nice skates with a good look.
customer_reviews.text: Nice skates with a good look. I got these for my daughter because she was looking at the plain white figure skates. These have a lot better look to them and they are pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Clean

customer_reviews.title: ... compliments on my new skates - they really are awesome. They are comfortable and I felt they were ...
customer_reviews.text: I received several compliments on my new skates - they really are awesome. They are comfortable and I felt they were true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna

customer_reviews.title: fine. we usually only skate a few times each ...
customer_reviews.text: for the price, fine. we usually only skate a few times each winter. for a serious skater, I would look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Delivered fast. I ordered 1.5 size up and they fit perfectly. I think I need to sharpen them.
customer_reviews.author: Nly

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Hey bodies for my daughter-in-law for Christmas gift and she just raves about them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H.

customer_reviews.title: I love my new skates
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I ordered the 10 I wear a 9 1/2 usually they run small
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Best skates ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love these skates. They are a bit larger than I expected but roomy for warm socks. They are incredibly comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ice skating
customer_reviews.text: I like it is a perfect Christmas present for my sister. Thanks you for arriving as soon as possible was so nice to see it.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Price

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: They are very sturdy and have thick sides to support your ankle well.
customer_reviews.author: Gino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter keeps thanking me for these skates! Loves them! Comfy and makes for a smooth skate.
customer_reviews.author: LABMO3

customer_reviews.title: These skates are perfect. Light
customer_reviews.text: These skates are perfect. Light, beautiful, stylish. They say used but they look BRAND NEW. Too bad I had a car accident within a week I purchased them....so no skating for me for a while so I had to return them. But thank God I am healed in Jesus' Name. Anyone who purchases these skates will love, love them! Nice and comfortable..girly yet sturdy....oh...I will see you again my skates.
customer_reviews.author: Tried and True

customer_reviews.title: ... is 6 so i ordered 6 and they fit excellent. They look beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My size is 6 so i ordered 6 and they fit excellent.They look beautiful, i love them, stylish, comfortable and worm. I'm a beginner so these skates are perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.author: ayim

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but for a begginer. My coach didn't Reccomend them
customer_reviews.author: Shopper321

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Very roomy and comfortable. I added waxed places to get them tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A Green

customer_reviews.title: they are great!
customer_reviews.text: I had to get them sharpened, and they need inserts. Other than that, they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: As I first time skater and one with ankle problems ...
customer_reviews.text: As I first time skater and one with ankle problems ,these skates gave me the stability and comfort to go out on the ice. As for what happened when I went out, it wasn't the skates that caused me to fall, and not gracefully on my knees. Well it could have been the skates ... I had no problem the first 10 minutes and then I got too brave and tried to keep up with a seasoned skater. A hockey player , who had no toe pick on the front of his skates. Trying to imitate him, down I went.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable and fit perfect I wear a size six shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable and fit perfect I wear a size six shoe and size five skate fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amy Doolittle

product_meta.title: Lake Placid Everest Women's Soft Boot Figure Ice Skate
product_meta.description: Glide across the ice in style and comfort with the Lake Placid Everest Women's Soft Boot Figure Ice Skate. This ice skate features a chrome-plated steel, heat-treated and edge-hardened carbon steel blade. Please sharpen these skates before use. Everest skates run about 1 size smaller than your woman's shoe size, so we recommend choosing 1 size larger than your shoe size or go up 2 sizes if you want more room for thick socks and/or growing room
feature_bullets: Soft Nu Buck boot design w/insulation
Reinforced ankle support w/extended counters for heel stability, & ankle strap
